title: Episode 41 - FBI or Federal Bureau of Investigations - in the early Cold War
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the origins of the FBI and the rise of J Edgar Hoover in American politics. We will also look at how the Cold War started for the FBI in 1917 and continued into the inter-war years. Finally, we chart the rise of the surveillance state in the United States and how Hoover helped to stoke the flames of the Second Red Scare.
